tool_description: Calculates optimal order quantities that minimize total inventory costs including ordering costs, holding costs, and quantity discount considerations.

product_ids.description: List of product SKUs to calculate EOQ for

annual_demand.description: Annual demand forecast for each product

ordering_cost.description: Cost to place one order for each product

holding_cost_rate.description: Annual holding cost as percentage of unit cost for each product

unit_cost.description: Unit purchase cost for each product

minimum_order_quantity.description: Supplier minimum order quantity for each product

maximum_order_quantity.description: Storage or budget constraint maximum for each product

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All required arrays must have the same length matching product_ids.
Invalid demand: Annual demand must be positive integers.
Invalid costs: Ordering costs, holding cost rates, and unit costs must be positive numbers.
Invalid quantity constraints: Minimum order quantity must be less than maximum order quantity when both specified.
Invalid discount format: Quantity discount tiers must follow 'quantity1:discount1,quantity2:discount2' format.
usage: Provide product information including demand, costs, and constraints. The tool calculates EOQ considering all cost factors and constraints to minimize total inventory costs.

optimal_order_quantities.description: Calculated optimal order quantity for each product

total_annual_cost.description: Total annual inventory cost for each product at optimal quantity

order_frequency_days.description: How often to place orders (days) for each product

cost_savings.description: Annual cost savings compared to current ordering patterns
